feed.title: Working on social contracts (was: Paper Currency)

entry.title: Working on social contracts (was: Paper Currency)
entry.summary: The context involves a disagreement over the concept of a dangerous idea that cannot be discussed. The speaker finds this type of thinking to be outdated and suggests creating a parallel development forum where people can freely express their thoughts without fear of judgment or censorship. However, the speaker takes issue with vicious attacks on the forum, which have led to individuals feeling hesitant to share their ideas. The speaker urges those causing problems to unsubscribe in the hopes of restoring a positive and productive environment for potential developers.
